title: The fashion investments to make in your 60s, whether you have £50 or £1,000
text:
In our six-part series, we outline the classic pieces worth buying at different ages. Previously we looked at fashion investments to make in your 20s, 30s, 40s and 50s. This week, we reveal why trainers and timepieces are worthwhile investments in your 60s.

Your 60s are a transitional decade for many, shifting from professional life to retirement, the pursuit of passion projects or a new post-retirement career. It’s not uncommon for a woman to be more busy and in-demand in her 60s than she was in earlier decades.
